synopsis.text:
Masaki's peaceful life in rural Japan takes an unexpected turn when he stumbles upon a crashed spaceship near his family's temple. Little did he know that saving the infamous space pirate, Ryouko Hakubi, would lead to a series of chaotic events that would forever change his destiny. As a result, a diverse group of alien women, including the elegant Princess Aeka and her lively sister Sasami, the quirky detective Mihoshi Kuramitsu and her competent partner Kiyone Makibi, and the unconventional scientist Washuu Hakubi, find themselves living under his roof.

As these extraterrestrial women struggle to adapt to the simple customs on Earth, they inadvertently create a whirlwind of trouble for Masaki. Despite the chaos they bring, he forms close bonds with each of them, leading him to uncover his true purpose in the universe. But with new enemies lurking in the shadows, Masaki must navigate the complexities of his newfound relationships and the challenges that come with them.

Join Masaki on an emotional rollercoaster ride as he discovers the true meaning of friendship, love, and destiny in this thrilling and heartwarming adventure. Will he be able to handle the attention of these powerful women and the dangers that come with them? Only time will tell.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
